high_descs: turn right and walk to the night stand. turn right and face the bed
pick up the book from the bed
turn around and walk towards the wall. turn right and face the desk
anns.task_desc: pick up the book and look at it under the light

high_descs: Walk to the bed in front of the book.
Grab the book from the bed.
Walk to the computer desk's edge.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a book under a lamp.

high_descs: Go right and then right again to face the bed.
Pick the book up from the edge of the bed.
Turn around and then turn right again to face the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a book and turn on a lamp.
